name: EmployToy
tag_list: social-media, job-board, web-technology, web-2-0, job, resume
overview: EmployToy is a new media career services in which employers and jobseekers connect with each other by using all the latest web technology tools. Our goal is to create a social network where Jobseekers can create a profile that incorporates their social life. Connect with employers by not just viewing their profiles and job postings but key information provide by the employers and current data mined online about that company. Create an environment where like-minded individuals can communicate and share experiences and recommendations about jobs. These immerging and innovative technology is whatâ€™s at the core of our process. We engage jobseekers online and offline thru the power of social media, mobile media, crowdsourcing and location based marketing EmployToy goal is to truly bring the social aspect to job prospecting.
